movies.title: Life Fine Tuned
movies.plot: The journey shows us what sound a spoiled young rock star makes when she is out of tune with life and how far her understudy will go to replace her. Star is the center of her universe when she discovers how small it really is. Paths cross between those climbing up the ladder, those falling off, and those putting the ladder away. This fresh, contemporary film offers the sounds of classical, rock, and bluegrass colliding as lives intersect, resulting in a new sound, a new life, a new beginning. In the end, Star discovers that the art to fine tuning her life is much like tuning a violin so she is in harmony with those around her, as she finds the family she never had.
movies.simplePlot: The journey shows us what sound a spoiled young rock star makes when she is out of tune with life and how far her understudy will go to replace her. Star is the center of her universe when ...

biography.bio: Joshua Blake is known for his work on About Face: Supermodels Then and Now (2012), Life Fine Tuned (2011) and Casualty (1986).
biography.name: Joshua Blake

biography.bio: Scott Clark is an actor, known for Chip (2011), Life Fine Tuned (2011) and Bunny (2010).
biography.name: Scott Clark

biography.bio: Ron Newcomb was born on January 29, 1973 in Washington, District of Columbia, USA. He is a producer and actor, known for Rise of the Fellowship (2013), Outlawed Faith (2016) and The Rangers (2016).
biography.name: Ron Newcomb

biography.bio: Jennie Marie O'Keefe is known for his work on Life Fine Tuned (2011) and The Match (2009).

biography.bio: Anastasiya Orlova is known for her work on Eversouls: The Collector and Sage (2012), Caveat (2011) and Life Fine Tuned (2011).
biography.name: Anastasiya Orlova

biography.bio: Cheryl Felicia Rhoads was born on April 14, 1954 in Hinsdale, Illinois, USA. She is known for her work on The Mother Goose Video Treasury (1987), Love Is Brewing : A 48 Hour Film (2016) and After Once Upon a Time (2008).
biography.name: Cheryl Felicia Rhoads

biography.bio: Natalia grew up in a small county in Virginia called Fauquier. She aspired to be an actress at a very young age, starring in various local theater productions. She got her first taste of the film industry when she began studying in McLean, VA. It was there where she starred in her first independent feature film. As soon as she turned 18, Natalia packed her things into a small SVU and headed out to Los Angeles, CA. She began studying and perfecting her technique at Beverly Hills Playhouse, Anthony Meindl's acting workshops, and other improvisational classes. Since then she has booked roles in independent films, short films, and commercials, both regional and national. With an extensive background in theater arts she has a range that can take on any role.
biography.name: Natalia Rowzee

awards.award: Bare Bones International Film & Music Festival 2012
